A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I am not a bot\, just a disgusted viewer.  The plethora of reasons I was unhappy with this movie have already been discussed on this site ad nauseum. 

I'll just say that my 3 biggest complaints were:
1. Terrible attempts at humor
2. Pointless\, boring Rose and her story
3. Blatant SJW themes

Disney and Rian Johnson were given a golden egg here.  A storied saga with a built-in fan base in the tens of millions.  That they gave us this movie in return is just one of the biggest disappointments I"ve endured in awhile.
